QuestData.Title: Show of Strength
QuestData.Description:
Their leader's time is coming soon now, but we need to dispose of his lieutenants first. Our momentum will be lost if dey reform ranks.
Jao-Ti is de first. Legend has it Lei Shen himself said he showed a great connection to de storms. He is leading de mogu's stormbinders.
De other is Subjugator Zheng, a slaver dat would make de Kul Tirans blush. You have never seen depravity like his.
Kill dem both, and make dem suffer. De mogu are no strangers to war, but neither are we.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Jao-Ti the Thunderous and Subjugator Zheng.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kaza'jin by the warship in Warport Rastari.
